segments.text: Excuse me . I need some storybooks in easy English . Do you have anything likethat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there are a lot of storybooks upstairs in our children's section . Some are written for young children , others for teens . Maybe some of them will suit your needs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll go take a look . Thanks for your help .
segments.speaker: S1
